channel.title: CVE Feed for ClusterLabs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ClusterLabs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-7035|2024-08-06T01:50:46.829Z -- clusterlabs -- pacemaker
item.description: An authorization flaw was found in Pacemaker before 1.1.16, where it did not properly guard its IPC interface. An attacker with an unprivileged account on a Pacemaker node could use this flaw to, for example, force the Local Resource Manager daemon to execute a script as root and thereby gain root access on the machine.
